summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented in the Pricing section: a “$50 deposit required” note with a brief reason is added under each plan description. However, the diff summary also indicates additional Pricing changes (monthly billing text and free-trial badges) that were not requested and may violate the non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Pricing section changed to display monthly billing (AUD per month).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 and not part of the stated goal (only add a deposit note). This may also conflict with the non-goal of not changing existing pricing presentation.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/components/marketing/Sections.tsx": "Pricing section now displays monthly billing (AUD per month)")

hallucinated_features.description: Added free trial badges for Standard (2 weeks free) and Premium (1 month free) plans.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1; the request only asks to add a deposit note under each plan.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/components/marketing/Sections.tsx": "with free trial badges for Standard (2 weeks free) and Premium (1 month free) plans")
